definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
to pluck (a string)/to play (a string instrument)/to spring or leap/to shoot (e.g. with a catapult)/(of cotton) to fluff or tease/to flick/to flip/to accuse/to impeach/elastic (of materials)

sentences.english: Flow characteristics of submunition dispensing simultaneously were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了子彈同時拋撒子母彈分離干擾氣動特性。

sentences.english: This is the second section about damage effectiveness analysis of aircraft carrier under the attacking of submunition.
sentences.chinese: 這是子母彈對航空母艦毀傷效果分析的第二部分。

sentences.english: She had been hit by shrapnel and arrived in the camp five days earlier.
sentences.chinese: 她被子母彈擊中，是在5天前抵達營地的。

sentences.english: This article is the third section to analysis effectiveness of the damage submunition against aircraft carrier.
sentences.chinese: 是子母彈對航空母艦毀傷效果分析的第三部分。

sentences.english: Shrapnel is made of many materials and its structure seems to be axial symmetry.
sentences.chinese: 子母彈是由多種材料組成，結構近似爲軸對稱形式。

sentences.english: This paper studies the effectiveness of fire when the rocket weapon fires rockets containing sub-missiles at a tank-group.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究火箭武器用子母彈對坦克羣射擊的射擊效力。

sentences.english: The paper will provide a useful tool for investigating the lethal power of the shrapnels.
sentences.chinese: 本文將爲論證子母彈的殺傷威力提供有力的工具。
